content: I've been thinking about how I can apply the concepts I'm learning to my own life, especially in terms of my relationships and writing. I've been trying to be more mindful of my language and assumptions, and to use more gender-neutral language when referring to people. I've also been thinking about how I can be a better ally to my non-binary and genderqueer friends, and how I can create a more inclusive and welcoming environment in my social circle.
